website_summaries.verdict: An action cam with a lot of features, excellent video quality and a more affordable price, the YI 4K is undeniably a good deal.
pros: The YI 4K Action Camera is a remarkable camera for the money, offering great features and performance in an easy-to-use package
It has long battery life for its size
A touchscreen gives you full control of the camera or you can use the high-speed Wi-Fi to connect to your phone and control via an app
App handles shooting, editing and sharing
YI continues to add features through firmware updates
cons: You'll need to buy accessories such as a waterproof housing
Though YI used Gorilla Glass, the touchscreen is not shatterproof
The microSD card slot is a little hard to access
Parts of the English app are still in Chinese

customer_reviews.title: loved it. Ignored the issue until late Feb 2017 ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this in Aug 2016 and aside from a BT pairing issue, loved it. Ignored the issue until late Feb 2017 and out of the blue decided to ask to tech support if there was a fix to the issue. Cannot imagine that I would get such great assistance. In a a slew of emails in a day. They decided that I got a defective unit and gave me a replacement. Hats off to Tyler & Duy in Tech Support for their excellent service to their customers.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Yi 4k camera was not new and would not format / recognize SD Cards.
customer_reviews.text: Item was clearly used, the box holding the camera had no tape holding it together, there were multiple bar codes taped over each other on the back of the box stating "NEW", and the cardboard insert meant to hold the camera in place was torn on one corner. The clear sticker meant to protect the camera's display was removed, and the camera display had fingerprints and smearing from previous use. The camera itself would not accept any SD card that was inserted, and any attempt at alleviating the problem through a recommended firmware update required an SD card! Overall I don't recommend purchasing this camera, maybe others have had better luck, but that's exactly what it is, LUCK. Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.author: ivz

customer_reviews.title: I think I was sent a used camera
customer_reviews.text: Got my camera and I get it all set up and turned on only to be greeted with a blue screen? No camera feed, no menu, just a blank screen. I charged it for over an hour, tried it again and still nothing. I was so excited for this product but now I’m just sorely disappointed. Also my battery and a microSD card (which the box says does not come with it) was already in my camera when I received it? I definitely ordered new so I feel like maybe I was just sent a defective used camera. I’m supposed to leave on a trip this weekend that I was excited to use the camera on-guess I should’ve gone GoPro!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing action cam
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it takes great video. I use it at least 2 or 3 times a week. The only complaint I have is that there is not a skeleton backdoor for it like go pro has or at least I couldn't find one on amazo. So if you want decent sound you either have to use it barebones or get a leather case for it, but to me that doesn't look like it would offer much protection. But other than that it works amazingly. One of my favorite features is that you can use the camera when it's charging.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Was good for about 4 months, now having multiple issues.
customer_reviews.text: This camera worked fine for the first few months but now I am experiencing multiple issues. I purchased this in Feb 2019 and now I am experiencing the Camera Busy problem that doesn't allow you to stop/start recording or turning off the camera without removing the battery. Also the Electronic Image Stabilization (EIS) is greyed out in video mode, that wasn't the case previously. This camera was a good price but now, I am in the market of having to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Cannot believe how awesome this camera is!
customer_reviews.text: Completely blown away by my YI 4k action camera. I've been shooting video with DSLRs for years so I'm not a novice. The touchscreen is responsive. The user interface takes minutes to learn, and the video quality is superb. I on board mic is also quite good all things considered. I use the camera using flat color setting and apply color correction in post production for my YouTube biking videos.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Calabrian

customer_reviews.title: Sound Horrible on all videos
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to film outdoor events that I help create for people dancing and concerts but the first two events I used it with last week the (I regret because those bands won't be back this summer) the video was great but the sound was HORRIBLE! The base was so bad and the sound was bad in all the videos and even dance performances. I was so excited to use this for 4th of July but have no option but to get a refund for this product. Bummed out since this was officially my first purchse of any action camera of sorts whoop whoop.....
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: The app for iOS crashes and is unstable as of 22-mar-2019.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is nice, app crashes and unuseable. It used to work fine but now it crashes with iOS. Tried 2 different iPhones. XR and iPhone 8. Both with the crashing application. Note that the image stabilization is really good with the phone, but the ability to adjust the setting by app is useful when the camera is mounted and inconvenient to access. Such as mounted to a helmet and in a case. This is a failure to keep the app working properly by YI. Not sure if this works issue affects android users, but losing much of the functionality of the camera by the app is a deal breaker for me. Highly disappointed in an otherwise good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody from nowhere

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera and a definite step above the less expensive offerings
customer_reviews.text: Had a bad experience with a previous camera (Not this brand) that I returned due to it being basically "you get what you pay for" and this camera is night and day in all aspects. Great video and stills, a top notch application for the iPhone and amazing battery life from the included battery. A few things I did decide on to add was a accessory package, a charger with two batteries and a soon to be delivered case. Total spent just a bit over 250.00 which if you were to do the same with another brand it could easily have been double that.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Go pro killer! I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera and I'm so happy I got this over a comparable priced go pro. The video quality and battery life are excellent. I deducted one star only because for my particular application and probably the only application where the ability to plug in an external mic is crucial. In order to motovlog you need a microphone installed inside your helmet. To get around this I chin mounted it with go pro accessories and the microphone can pick up while inside waterproof housing what's going on. Still for every other possible use for an action cam this far exceeded expectations for me!
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to record memories
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera with the sole intent of using it as a dash camera while driving through Germany, I'm from the US and had never been. The camera exceeded my expectations and thanks to it I'll be able to relive my drive through Germany for years to come. The picture on the unit is great, especially for the size. The image stabilization really helped out with driving, the video is smooth. I never honestly used the 4k resolution because I don't watch content in 4k, and I had limited storage and 2 weeks of vacation, the 1080 though is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Yi helped me
customer_reviews.text: Pros Awesome battery life, Amazing features, Beautiful video quality, very low cost (for its class), doesn't overheat, great touchscreen, very good app Cons I had a few problems with this 4K camera. Statistically, things like this happen sometimes. For example, I had to return a 400$ action cam from a different company before, because that camera kept overheating. ***Update Yi helped me and this was a good experience. I use this camera daily as a dash cam and often in my quadcopter, also.
customer_reviews.author: Michigander

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera, excellent customer support
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a GoPro to compare this to, but so far have been extremely happy with this camera. I have taken it on 2 vacations now and it takes great video and still pics are better than I expected. Where this camera really shines, for me at least, is with customer services. After returning from the 2nd vacation, I noticed that the waterproof case had some small cracks along the hinges. I went to the Yi site used the online form stating my issue and within hours and 2 email exchanges I received notice that a replacement was on it's way. It doesn't get much easier and I would not hesitate to buy another product from Yi.
customer_reviews.author: Triplejnj

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly happy with the Product & Price Point
customer_reviews.text: I can't compare it to a GoPro because I don't have one, but I love this little camera. I got it to take with us on our honeymoon and it was fantastic. The battery life was pretty good, it's got a great footprint and it's very easy to use. Just one button and you're ready to go. Now I keep it in my purse to capture fun everyday moments. I wouldn't really use it as my still photo camera, but it takes great video. I'm very happy with the picture. The phone app also works flawlessly for me and it's easy to connect and control (i've got a galaxy s7). for me, it's a fantastic alternative to an expensive GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I have one of the original Yi cameras, cost about sixty dollars. I bought this recently as an upgrade, this is 4k with supposedly better frame rates etc. My experience so far is that the picture quality is WORSE than the old version of the camera I have. Very disappointed. I've tried all kinds of settings, I really can't get it to shoot very high quality video. I wouldn't recommend this at this price (currently its listed around one twenty)
customer_reviews.author: Voneatabaneeta

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera and at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Rather impressed with this little camera. I wanted the GoPro, but was afraid that an expensive camera would get lost at the bottom of the ocean like my last camera, so I wanted something that was less expensive that would still deliver a decent picture. This camera has a Sony 12mp sensor inside so that was a real selling point for me and the inclusion of a touch display on the back and the great video reviews that I have seen convinced to me purchase this little gem. SO far, I am really impressed. Glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mad_Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great support and video/picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple YI products. I use there cameras daily for driving and security. I had purchase one of these cameras about 6 months ago and it eventually failed after a software update. The customer service was great and after some trouble shooting they sent me a new one. I bought a second one on sale because I think they are a great value. We would do many outdoor activities but were not good about taking pictures of our selves. I bought a remote and a mini flexible tripod. Now we have plenty of pictures for our Christmas cards.
customer_reviews.author: Chilly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing video quality but poor audio.
customer_reviews.text: I think the video quality of this action cam is amazing, but the audio was terrible. Too bad because I would have loved to keep it. I ended up returning this and getting a GoPro Hero 5 Black on sale, and I have to say that I'm very impressed with the video and audio quality of the Hero 5 Black. If there were any uses that didn't rely on onboard audio, then I think this little camera would be perfect for that. But I just wish the audio while out of its waterproof case were better.
customer_reviews.author: John Klopp

customer_reviews.title: Use this for my drones....but with limitations
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on one of my drones, because this camera has dual band WiFi and I needed 5ghz, this unit has image/video stabilizer (great for drones) but the only issue which doesn't effect the star ratings here is the distance the cameras WiFi has, to me it's great to use to start the video recording but when the camera is about 100ft away from the smartphone it has loss of signal, and when the camera is close enough to reconnect....it doesn't It's a small trade off for a 4k video camera for drone
customer_reviews.author: PMC

customer_reviews.title: App doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Overall OK camera. App doesn't work. Bough extra yi remote control + selfie stick but cannot connect the remote to the camera. Can't update firmware because we can't connect the camera to the app. Have tried everything, still cannot get the app to work. Camera also doesn't come with any accessories. You have to buy more extra accessories. Mic sound is good, loud and clear, but not good in windy condition as you'll hear all the wind noise. Picture is good, better than other action cams in low light condition. Very disappointing that the remote won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Only true competitor for GoPro
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use action cameras for mountain biking. This is the only true competitor for GoPro. The app is fantastic, frequent firmware updates, excellent battery life. I have used a few of the cheap cameras on Amazon and they are garbage. Some things I don't like: - With electronic image stabilization turned on, in 1080p@60, the image is somewhat blurred and stabilization is almost none existent or jerky. - No waterproof case, is not splash proof. Yes it does have a built in TriPod mount but by the time you buy a housing to mount the camera you could have just gotten the GoPro Hero 5 Session and not needed one.
customer_reviews.author: KiGrind

customer_reviews.title: On the fence
customer_reviews.text: Can't get it to stream to Facebook which was the main reason for purchasing to stream softball games to the teams facebook page that teammates family members are unable to attend. Connecting to the camera via wifi is hit-or-miss and I find I have to turn off and back on the wifi on my phone to get it to connect consistently (Samsung G9+). 720/8x slow motion is very nice for breaking down athlete motions and showing them what they are doing right and wrong. Only had it for a few hours and am on the fence as to whether it is a keeper or not.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: Battery dies super quick so that sucks. I bought extras, and a three port charger for them. You can only use certain sd cards, they happen to be expensive ones too. I used this camera on a hiking trip. And the video stabilization good. The coolest feature is the app you can install on your phone. You can love feed to your phone and use it as a remote to take photos or start recording. I was alone on the trip with my dog, so I was able to use the app to take photos of me and him. I used it the entire trip. Some of these photos were snipped from video.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunky

customer_reviews.title: The quality of a GoPro but for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.text: This YI 4K action camera is perfect. It has all the bells and whistles the much more expensive units do. I have used this for the past 5 months and only one complaint. The battery life isn't long. But that's ok. Just buy a couple more batteries and you'll be set. My son uses it for his YouTube channel and we are thoroughly impressed. The Image Stabilization is very good. Slow motion, time laps, and photos are also very good. Look on YouTube and search for a comparison of this unit vs any other more expensive units.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome camera. I bought this with the accessory kit that has the waterproof case, helmet attachment etc and have no regrets getting this. Have used this camera three times now while snowboarding and each time I've been super impressed with the video and picture quality. The fact that this is half the price of the GoPro is just icing on the cake. The app works pretty seamlessly with the camera, just need to make sure it's linked up before you strap it on top of your head, and then you can control the functions of the camera through the app. Overall I'd definitely recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: hamster ball

customer_reviews.title: Screen is great, user interface is super snappy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is insane! I have a couple of the original Yi action cams, and this thing is totally worth the price. Screen is great, user interface is super snappy. Amazing video quality. Better audio than the original Yi, with a wind reduction mode that works pretty well. I'll definitely get way more use out of this cam because of the display and instant playback abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Nothom

customer_reviews.title: Great product, could improve on the house in quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like this action camera way way better than my go Pro so many more features for the price and the sound quality is also much much better. Thanks for a great product. I will however say that the casing itself it’s not the strongest as it has already developed a crack around the mounting screw on the bottom. I am mediately glued it and still have complete functionality however this is something that I think they could improve on.
customer_reviews.author: Lifethewildride

customer_reviews.title: Amazing in Daylight!
customer_reviews.text: This is a stupendous value! You get a 4K camera with a fish-eye lens. I have used it in many professional productions. The camera needs a lot of light - and fails to deliver professional results at dusk and low-light interiors. The ease of use is also outstanding. It shoots high-speed at 1080P not 4K. It allows for an external mic via a mini-jack (but you need to remember to set audio to the external mic in the menu). I recommend the rubber housing skin - because if you drop the camera, it will break. Also get extra batteries and the underwater housing - all so affordable. I highly recommend this camera! I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: MacMillan Films Prime

customer_reviews.title: I love this little camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera. Was about to pull the trigger on buying a GoPro Hero 5 Black, but saw this one listed and reviewed it and glad I went with it and saved some money. Love the 1/4 inch screw mount. I gave it only 4 stars because my only complaint is that the add said it was capable of EIS in 4K. That is not the case I learned the hard way. That was disappointing. Other than that it looks great. The selfie stick option is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Updated 11 Mar 2019: It stopped working after 2 months due to a hardware issue. The battery is fine and it charges but the camera does not turn on. Apparently this even happens to newer models of YI cams, it is somehow a "common" problem. I am currently dealing with YI customer support to get the camera replaced. Original Review: The only thing is that auto low-light mode cannot be enabled in all modes. And I wish I could have a choice of more frame rates for certain resolutions (specially 720)
customer_reviews.author: Ale

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera but poor stabilization
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great in every respect except the poor image stabilization. Compared to a GoPro hero 6 it had very noticeable shake even when just walking slowly. Shame because otherwise it would have been a great budget alternative to a GoPro. If you will only use it while stationary this is a great camera, but most people buying action cameras need this important feature, unless you use a gimbal to steady the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Save your $$ .. buy Gopro or a different product
customer_reviews.text: The most disappointing camera .. both gimbal and camera battery life sucks.. especially when you are on a long trip where you have limited charging options, this is completely useless. More over even with bright daylight video quality was pretty basic in 4k. For 300 bucks you are better off sticking to gopro
customer_reviews.author: Hari

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have a gopro hero 5 black and other action cameras. The Yi is a pleasant surprise to my arsenal. I really like the feel or it better. The layout of the touch screen and its responsiveness. Video quality was as good and better than my gopros. Depending on what you are filming this is great. I use this for on land cinematic shots using a gimbal. I would like it to be waterproof but it isn't needed for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy H

customer_reviews.title: Does not livestream!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just to Live Stream an event that is upcoming. I got it delivered, tried to set it up and would not work. Emailed customer support and they said that their cameras do not support live stream even though their app and their webiste shows that it can. If you are buying for the live stream feature, buy a GoPro Hero 3 or newer and download the Live4 app that lets you stream from the GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: KC_Fan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent action camera
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed with this little camera! We love to snorkel, but I’ve been reluctant to invest so much in a GoPro. At my brother-in-law’s recommendation, I tried this one and loved it on our recent trip to Cozumel. I bought the camera, accessory pack (with underwater case and floating grip), extra battery pack, and SD card for ~$175. The battery lasted our entire boat/beach/snorkeling trip without having to use the backups, and it was easy enough for my 9 and 11-year-olds to use!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ainsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price, the picture and the battery life are on par with the GoPro if not better, very pleased with the features and the app, if youre looking for an Action Camera but don't want to spend GoPro money, buy the Yi Cam without hesitation, all the accessories are compatible with the GoPro accessories, the touchscreen its easy to read and make it easy to change the settings on the fly, having lots of fun with my new toy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it claims it will do!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this camera. I own many other YI cameras for home and other action cameras. I was unable to get it to connect to Live Stream (which is why I bought it). It would also default to burst mode and without any warning it would start taking pictures without being touched. I am tired of messing with it so it's going back. Don't get me wrong I really like my outher Yi products but I had an issue with a dome camera I bought for my daughter and it took 3-4 weeks to get it straightened out.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until the mic quit working
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Yi 4K Auction Camera back in late February 2018 and have been using the action cam for vlogs. Then one day I started noticing the sound only coming out one side in my recordings, I didn't think anything of it and just thought my Gimbal Stabilizer was covering right stereo mic, but I noticed it happening in more of my videos until both mics gave out on me, so I googled it and it turns out that there has been numerous audio problems with the Yi 4K and Yi 4K Plus. Its so disappointing because I love this camera and YI apparently doesn't have a fix for it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin I. Hodge

customer_reviews.title: for some reason its better than my gopro hero4 black
customer_reviews.text: I just received this earlier and i've tested some outdoor videos and take photos. it was superb....for some reason its better than my gopro hero4 black...it response quickly using my phone and you can adjust the settings using the apps....i ordered the housing as well but haven't tried it with casing on..we'll see how it goes...so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Carmela

customer_reviews.title: Not GoPro level but decent.
customer_reviews.text: So I "had" this camera for about a month and used it often, picture and video quality were...good, but not great. The stabilization works better then a lot if action cameras but still needs improvement. For the money though right at $100( and sometimes less) it's a solid choice for an action camera.
customer_reviews.author: Hickory

customer_reviews.title: No Live-Stream as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for live streaming our softball teams' games. The description clearly states it live streams. However, I was unable to get the live streaming to work, so I emailed the Yi support team (no response) and then called them. I was told on the phone that the Yi camera no longer live streams. Why would that stop after others were apparently able to use it in the past? Anyway, I was disappointed because that feature was the reason I bought it in the first place. I guess I'll be returning it. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Decent value
customer_reviews.text: Picture looks amazing when the camera is on a tripod or attacked mount. The videos are shaky and the built in image stabilization doesn't do much to help, it adds a wobbly jello effect. If you have a gimbal or good video editing software this camera is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: JLLS

customer_reviews.title: GoPro Killer
customer_reviews.text: IMO this is a GoPro killer. Much easier to use than the GoPro and if there is any difference in video quality it is very minimal and surely not worth double the price I paid for the YI 4k. My only complaint and this is not about camera quality is that YI does not sell accessories separate. I want their gimbal but they only sell it with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: We're so happy with this camera. My kids love to film themselves running around and playing in the pool with it. I'm not an expert with these types of cameras. Heck i'm not an expert with ANY type of camera, but so far after 3 months of almost daily usage I will say that the camera seems to be made with quality in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovethejob

customer_reviews.title: Solid Camera, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to get a GoPro Hero4 Session as a cheap action camera, but I saw this for around the same price. This is a much better value than the GoPro. This is able to record in 2.7k at 60fps, which is a huge upgrade from my old action camera. The interface is slick and the video quality is very good. The waterproof case feels well built too, although I haven't had a chance to test it underwater yet. Overall, I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Roberts

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Budget ActionCams
customer_reviews.text: So I got this a little more than a year ago, I used it every time I went diving and it performs pretty well for how small and affordable it is (especially now, sub $100!) The battery crapped on me after some time since I got it & Yi sent me a new battery overseas! The post lost it but I that's not Yi fault. Had to buy a third-party which doesn't perform well.
customer_reviews.author: CasualShopper

customer_reviews.title: Total GoPro KILLER!
customer_reviews.text: As a professional cinematographer I will say this is the real deal. Sure it's not a "GoPro".. but that's because it's actually better. At half the price & twice the battery life the YI 4K is everything you want in an action camera. This is such an amazing camera I literally ordered 4 additional cameras. They say you get what you pay for.. with the YI 4K you actually get more than you pay for in an action camera, all the mounting "gadgets" are sold separately but a majority of the mounts you already own probably work and if they don't YI sells a bundle for about $29 that has every mount that GoPro sells a la cart.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer of Stuff

customer_reviews.title: 1 year update.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year in June or July. Loved it, video quality is great. It did fail on me about 7 months in. Lucky it came with a one year warranty. Yi's customer service was very help n fast. They email u a 2 day shipping label. Send it in they check it out n send u a new one via Amazon. My unit for some reason you couldn't get any audio. Just video. Fingers crossed this doesn't happen again cause I really do like this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Almost Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to GoPro
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this camera as a more affordable alternative to a GoPro. I've been pleased with it for basic travel videos and bummin' around the house with pets and children. Additionally, I've dabbled in some time lapse photography and have been very pleased with how smooth it is for the price paid. This camera connects very easily to an iPhone via their iOS app, though oddly some of the firmware update messages have only been in Chinese. The only negative so far has been any true indication of battery life left in the display. The indicator bars are kinda whacky. Otherwise a solid, affordable alternative to other cameras out on the market.
customer_reviews.author: RCID

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, nothing to compare with.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first action camera. I wanted image stablelization so I got this model. To enable IS the camera compromises quality slightly, I think the binning mode of the image sensor is changed to allow the image shifting necessary, but I have not investigated further. First time using it I mounted the camera in a waterproof housing to the handlebars of a SeaDo and drove around a lake. The vibration from the engine is fairly strong. The result is impressive for the video, the audio was useless. The microphones picked up noise directly through the mechanical mount and overloaded the mic inputs. The 60fps video playback looks good using VLC under Linux.
customer_reviews.author: cmeyers

customer_reviews.title: Slight Learning Curve
customer_reviews.text: The camera has, good picture, video, and features. Instrution manual and software worthless, you're on your own with this camera. Buy this if you are good at problem solving. Edit; I would like to raise my rating to 10 stars after using this camera for a while, I find its controls are self-explanatory. I love that it is easy to use and it shoots awesom video. Only problem is that it's harder to plug the cord into the USB port than it should be, it seems like the port will be the first thing to fail.
customer_reviews.author: ofenmann

customer_reviews.title: Strong competitor to GoPro
customer_reviews.text: This camera looks like it's designed by Apple. It's stylish....and also comes without any accessories which cost extra. Regarding quality of recording - it does well. Touch screen is good resolution, low light sensitivity is good enough (as far as action cams go). One flaw is that all controls are touch screen so cannot change settings when camera is placed in a waterproof case.
customer_reviews.author: dmk

customer_reviews.title: Phone app to camera connection could be better. Otherwise, a nice action camera
customer_reviews.text: My main complaint about this is with the app's connection to it through WiFi. Most of the time I don't get the live video feed, and need to restart camera or app before it will work. Sometimes it just refuses to connect to the camera. My GoPro 3 was a lot less finicky, though the lag with the GoPro 3 is a lot higher than this one. Video quality is good, construction feels solid, microSD port has a cover that's a bit awkward to get out of the way with some cables.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: WiFi keeps disconnecting...
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good camera, like the touch screen for settings... However, the camera kept on disconnecting from my phone, which made the experience very annoying. Behavior did not change after a firmware upgrade. Have a GoPro hero5 session, which has been a solid performer, however has a short battery life, hence this purchase... Will look at GoPro hero 5 black next...
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Audio Issues  - High Pitch Static Hissing Sound
customer_reviews.text: The video from the camera is top notch. However, the hissing static noise on all videos makes this camera unusable if you want to record any audio alongside the video ( which most of us do ). This is simply unacceptable and it appears to be a common problem with these cameras. I would definitely think twice before wanting to buy a YI camera again.
customer_reviews.author: Georgi

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, horrible sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm a drummer and bought this to record my live gigs, which are very loud. So I wasn't expecting the sound quality to be stellar from the built in mic alone, but it was absolutely unbearable. Just pure high-pitched static hiss that was completely out of sync with the video picture. The video and picture quality are decent though, and the low light capability is great. I will need to purchase external mics though for the audio issue.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long - save your money
customer_reviews.text: Camera seemed pretty good and was happy with it until it stopped working recently. It doesn't turn on and when trying to charge it gets very hot like something is going to catch on fire. The camera thread cracked after maybe 2x mounting it on a tripod plate. There's a reason GoPro's are more money. Buy a new or used Hero5.
customer_reviews.author: WNF

customer_reviews.title: Great Action camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great action camera. This is my first ever action camera hoping that it will give me a push to move more and exercise. The YI is reasonably priced and delivers great pictures and movies. It's easy to use like a pro, even though I am not at all. The screen is helpful and the menues are easy to understand. The only drawback is the battery life. It gives much less than 2 hours when it's fully charged. I used it during one trip and it gave around one hour.
customer_reviews.author: YaHya

customer_reviews.title: Buy Something else cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I barley just got this camera and I have only used it a hand full of times. It has been in a protective plastic water proof housing the whole time and hasn't been knocked around at all. But as you can see from the picture it started cracking from just plugging into the charger. The plastic is cheaply made and looks like it cracks really easy. Whats disappointing about this is I am supposed to take it on vacation with me hopefully it still holds up.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: No Voice Control, However Great Action Cam
customer_reviews.text: I am still trying to figure out why this action camera at one time had voice control, but it seems that the latest firmware eliminates the feature. I see youtube videos that this model can be controlled by voice. I find it a great buy though and probably wouldn't use voice control that much anyway, but would have given this a 5 star if it did.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas N. GilmoreTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Sound is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The first couple of times I used this item I thought it was just a windy day however when I used the camera indoors and watch the recording I was sadly mistaken. After 5 to 10 minutes of recording a loud cracking windy noise takes over the audio - im going to try my hand with the warranty team.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: iphone app is worthless, making cam also worthless, cam itself buggy
customer_reviews.text: Tested cam by itself before downloading iphone app. Seemed ok. Shot 2 videos skiing. Third effort the camera froze entirely and I couldn't even shut it off or do a hard re-boot. Finally pulled battery. Next day downloaded iphone app (iphone 6) Worked ok a few times but disconnected frequently. Then froze, and froze the camera again. Could not get app to stay open more than 1 second. Deleted and re-loaded. Same issue. Called customer service and listened to crappy music 2 hours, then was disconnected. If I can't get it resolved today, product is going back!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Same spec as gopro, half the price, LCD is great, you don't even need to connect it to the phone, you can use the lcd screen. No need for manual, pretty easy menu, point and shoot. Even if gopro came out with hero 5 soon, it would probably cost $700, 8k, does anyone have a 8k screen?
customer_reviews.author: Prime

customer_reviews.title: My 5th Yi and it works well.
customer_reviews.text: Shooting motorcycle vids with these inexpensive cameras works well. Using 64 G or 128 G cards is no problem. Waterproof cases work easily and have worked in high speed, pouring rain. Battery life could be better but is comparable to the go pro. Can't buy Yi replacement batteries and the aftermarket replacements are inferior. Simple, easy to use, reliable.
customer_reviews.author: James McAllen

customer_reviews.title: best cam i have been working with
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes superb pictures and videos, best cam i have been working with. The combination to use it together with the phone as an "extended eye" to click pictures is very nice as well. FYI, the cam won't work with every SD card. Very happy with it so far (using it for 2 months now)
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Divakar

customer_reviews.title: Low light problems when image stabilisation is turned on. Awesome battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is a damn good camera for the price, it could easily compete with GoPro Hero 5. Be careful you use the best microSD cards, the cheap ones can give you errors sometimes. My problem was with the low light exposure. A lot of times objects where too dark for an indoor shot. Then i noticed that if you turn off image stabilisation, everything it”s pretty fine. I wish i could have the image stabilisation also, but... Besides that, really great camera, with AWESOME battery life
customer_reviews.author: Vicu T.

customer_reviews.title: Image nice and clear, but suffers from extensive fisheye distortion...
customer_reviews.text: Image quality is quite good and the size and features are pretty good. However it has quite dramatic fisheye distortion. I've seen YouTube videos explaining how to remove most of it, so it's largely correctable, it's just a huge pain to do so. The menu system works pretty well and it isn't too hard to find and change any setting you want.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Blow

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value and amazing performance!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and an AMAZING action camera! Touch screen is just as responsive as any smartphone or tablet I've used. Takes very crisp videos and the electronic image stabilization is impressive. I purchased as an upgrade to the first gen Yi camera to capture videos on my TBS Discovery and TBS Vendetta multirotors. I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone looking for a great action camera.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Solid competition to the larger brands
customer_reviews.text: So far the product has been great for me, I’ve been using it to RTMP for LiveStreaming as well as using it as the general action camera style. It’s a very solid competitor with GoPro but at a more affordable price. Eventually maybe adding a live streaming stabilizer might be cool
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the highest quality image it could make. The video was even worse even with the highest settings. No stabilization. I'm seriously wondering how YT vids and site reviews showed clear images. Got this cam just before a once-in-a-lifetime, 2-week vacation to CO. Wanted to capture the views and ziplining Royal Gorge. Couldn't even use it. We used our phones instead and had superior quality compared to this 'thing'. We lost out on getting vids of whitewater rafting and other events we specifically wanted a good cam for. Should have gone with the Osmo or Hero7. This thing is total junk. Will be trying to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Code3

customer_reviews.title: For the price I guess it is worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works great for time lapse and has decent video quality. I wish it had 60 fps in 4k but the 4k looks good. I wish all action cams had a 1/4 20 screw like this. It makes attaching to a tripod very easy. All in all for the price this is a great action cam.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Huebner

customer_reviews.title: Gopro killer, dropped from 2nd floor balcony still working!
customer_reviews.text: Gopro killer! Great camera for the money. you get a touch screen and 4k. One thing they need to fix is if you use lens distortion correction and electronic image stabilization you get some weird effects. Otherwise there is no Action camera in this price range that can give you so much functionality for so little price. Compared to the first generation, this is amazing. I dropped it from the second floor off a balcony and all that happen was the case split open. I pushed it back together and it was like it never happened except a little rough patch on the edge and lens housing that took the bulk of the impact force.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely the GoPro killer
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the GoPro killer. Absolutely blown away with the image quality. The audio is equal to the GP but not better. Ease of use with touchscreen and voice commands sets it on the same level as the GP 5 and 6. The Yi4k is the equivalent to the GP Hero 5 black 4K at 30fps is great. If you want the same as the GP 6 with 4K at 60fps get the Yi 4K+ better image quality than the GP 6 hands down and less cost.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Mr D Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but a great action cam for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My Yi 4k action camera arrived today and I tested it out. I was quite impressed! This action cam is amazing for the price! Although I have Two problems with this camera, 1. the audio is pretty bad when it has the waterproof case on. 2. the video quality is pretty bad when it's night time, i had a better time with the camera when the sun was out. But overall, this camera is pretty great, can't Lie. I Love this camera. Although, please still try to fix those problems.
customer_reviews.author: magdaleno campos

customer_reviews.title: Great action camara
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a different camera the first time and I was not happy with it amazon was happy to make a return. so I purchased the Yi 4K action camera and I'm very glad that I did it's a good camera takes great pictures and videos and the app for the phone is easy to use and it works this is the first sports action camera that I ever had and I was already able to send videos to my friend and I've only had the camera for 2 days
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Santangelo

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT TIME LAPSE WITH THIS CAMERA!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used my Yi on a few occasions and it worked great but after filming my first time lapse, the camera won't turn on as it should and its been heating up more than it should. I have had to take the battery out and in, and then it sometimes won't even turn on. This is very disappointing and I've noticed that many others are having the same issue. This issue needs to be fixed!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Great value VS the Hero4 even competes with Hero 5 a bit. For the price, it's excellent! Buy two!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Way cheaper than a GoPro Hero4 with comparable capabilities, performance and quality of the Hero 4. Not as excellent compared to the Hero 5 but for the price its an EXCELLENT value. I will buy again but probably the 4k Plus version which looks like a great value too! FYI - my usage purpose is NOT underwater and not particularly shock sensitive... no biking or skiing here, so I was not worried that it didn't come with a protective housing. I use it more like a point and shoot camera for filming camping and shooting practice in the woods and it works great for that purpose without the plastic housing.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Owned a few gopro models thorughout the years and lets just say im very impressed with this thing ive seen a few gopro knockoff footages back in the old days and they were just awfull. This camera on the other hand goes toe to toe with gopro models all the way up to the 6. Everything works great and the footage is excellent. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Good for live streaming to twitch tv
customer_reviews.text: Great cam! After owning a number of gopros i love this! I switched to this cam for live streaming on twitch tv. I can stream directly to a hotspot through the Yi app. Works great i can stream for about 4 hours before needing to charge the cam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Birthday present
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the yi 4k action camera for my son's 13th birthday. I was very impressed with the speed of delivery. Only took two days. This camera is an upgrade from the sjcam 4000. It only took me 10min to set up SD card and install yi app then firmware update. We haven't taken any video yet, but the voice control and touch screen work awesome. This camera is so easy to use. My son has not received it yet. His birthday is this weekend. I will post an update after we use it and view footage. For now it's definitely a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: WiFi almost never get connected
customer_reviews.text: I have never ever succeeded to connect WiFi from my Pixel 2 app. In stead, to connect WiFi, you have to go through very awkward process. Besides, it does not connect 100% even though I am going through the same procedure. As a matter of fact, the success rate of this awkward process seems to be way below 50%.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera! It's a top notch alternative to GoPro. Video quality is really great! The only thing I would like to change is the way it names the files it recorded. I would like it to use the date time stamp file format but it doesn't have the option. It is a great camera and I will be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: JoeMofknDot

customer_reviews.title: Giving gopro something to worry about
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to the YI from Akasso for content creation, what a world of difference. I wished there was voice control, but otherwise the camera is great. The video quality slaughters the Akasso, the stereo mic does a good job too. The 4K does not accept an external mic. Overall this is a great cam at the $200 price point.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Way cool
customer_reviews.text: Just received it, put it together- pretty dang easy to assemble. Easy to navigate through the menu. For such a small thing it packs a decent punch. It's perfect for enthusiasts and professionals as a C cam to get interaction and action of people. I'll know more how well it works in the field, but it seems like it will be great for run and gunnin filming. Being a small camera and a point and shoot the low light is pretty decent, grainy, but not terrible. Nice array of frame rate settings and ratio options, definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matador

customer_reviews.title: Video performance good
customer_reviews.text: Video performance were good, gyro was a bit average for an action camera.......Had to return mine due to EIS wasn't quite up to par per reviews but mine came with a 1200mah battery instead of a 1400mah as described
customer_reviews.author: Wildhog

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great Price
customer_reviews.text: What an action camera!!!! Where should I begin.... The camera has a great build quality. The display at the back of the camera is one of my favorite features, it truly makes a big difference, in capturing content and adjusting settings. The camera offers a wide array of settings (4k, 2k, etc - range of view, fps, etc.) for video- all of which have it's purposes. I have had this camera for well over three months and thus far I have not regreted the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnell

customer_reviews.title: More features for less money than other 4K action cameras
customer_reviews.text: Just recently received this Yi 4K action camera and love it already. Takes very good quality photos and video. Very user friendly with easy to use features. The voice control works great and the Yi app is convenient to use for editing video and remote control for the camera. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a budget friendly action camera. I have yet to find anything I do not like about the camera and give it a full 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Monty CNY

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded the firmware to support voice control which is fantastic. Even with the waterproof case
customer_reviews.text: Just used two days. Upgraded the firmware to support voice control which is fantastic. Even with the waterproof case, my voice can control the camera. I think it will be very useful outdoor without remote controller. The touch-screen is very easy and convenient to use. I ordered one water-proof case that can support touch-screen so that I can control the camera without opening the case. Right now, so far so good. Will update later after use for some days.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: It is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Yi 4k action camera from Amazon. Upon unboxing I found it to be a very well made camera, similar to the first Yi action camera. This is a huge upgrade from the first one, it is ready for video or pictures within 2 seconds after turning it on, and the touch screed is very responsive and ultra-sharp. I do not have a Hero4 to compare it to but I see others stating that it is better all around. I will be updating this review as soon as I get to use it a few days. But for now, it is a real winner.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Toth

customer_reviews.title: Better than you think
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, all I need for what I do (video of motorcycle rides). It's image quality is really excellent with nice FPS. For the cost this thing can't be best. Image stabilization is meh, but it's meh even on the super expensive GoPros.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: very good product..best option out there for the price
customer_reviews.text: good product lacks in instructions for what modes do what, good video quality but the audio is lacking any vibration really distorts audio. and the app for windows isnt free but the mobile is?? video files are huge so a large sd card is a must. battery life is more in 90 to 100 min mark rather than 2hrs. the biggest downfall i have found is that the wifi connection to the app is very limited in range and disables the cellular network while in use so it is easy to miss calls while in use.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher hall

customer_reviews.title: WOW 4k at a sub $200 price tag - that works!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the camera for my youtube channel and it's awesome! especially for the price. I've recorded a couple of hours with the unit, and the image quality is superb. at wide angle there is a bit of fish eye, and the stabilazation thingy (filter?) is a bit slow. outside of that great product and great price
customer_reviews.author: Mark's reviews

customer_reviews.title: which was like the toast of the town for the entire year ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a whole league above my aging Go Pro Hero 3+ Black, which was like the toast of the town for the entire year of 2013. Now people have all this access to action cameras and are spoiled. For the price, this thing is better than anything else. That being said, I feel as if most of the subpar reviews are from manufacturing defects. I have had no such problems, so from the point of a perfectly operable YI 4K camera, I can attest to its near perfection.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Over all a great product! Haven't used it for video footage just yet but from the bits I've done with it, it's performed exactly as described! Only issue I had with getting this product was shipping time, but I suspect it was due to buying this product right around Christmas period. So am not complaining, but product arrived in a nice package and safely here in New Zealand!
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Camera seemed good, but bluetooth remote is CHEAP.
customer_reviews.text: The product was nice, but the bluetooth remote for the selfie stick is very cheaply made. Returned the whole set. Just get camera in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: jr64495

customer_reviews.title: The touchscreen isn't working, and I am unable to record videos.
customer_reviews.text: This camera was working great until a minor mishap. The bottom left section of the touchscreen is not responding to my touches. I am unable to click "video" in the record mode. Thus, I am unable to take any videos with this camera because of one malfunctioning section of my touchscreen. I am unsure how to contact Yi about this, but hopefully I will find a way.
customer_reviews.author: bubbamax

customer_reviews.title: Great Underwater Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera with the waterproof case made by the same manufacturer for this camera. In reading reviews it was recommended by other buyers to get the manufacturer waterproof case. I think that was the right thing to do and it was not expensive. It worked perfectly. I purchased the Go Pro Wrist band and used the band that goes around the thumb. My son and I both took turns wearing this and absolutely loved it. We are looking forward to using it in our next trip. We did not have any concerns with the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money High quality gyro stabilization 4K@30fps Toucscreen LCD Display Wifi / Bluetooth Top Class Hardware Excellent Vi
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Value for money High quality gyro stabilization 4K@30fps Toucscreen LCD Display Wifi / Bluetooth Top Class Hardware Excellent Video and Photographic Quality Bitrate up to 60Mb/s Good quality stereo audio Cons: No waterproof case included No accessories in the package (but you can adapt gopro accessories) No external microphone I just got mine yesterday and I would say that the cam has a good quality. However, the microphone is not good. You barely can hear the sound of the video. Overall, good camera
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Decided on this instead of a GoPro ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Decided on this instead of a GoPro and do not regret it. Could get two for the price of an equivalent GoPro. Easy to navigate through settings. CHEAP waterproof cases(anyone who has bought GoPro stuff knows the markup price they charge for plastic)
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: great 4K footage
customer_reviews.text: works really well, great 4K footage. This camera has a really hard time in low light, however, which isn't a big deal most of the time but can be a bit of an issue when you're going a time lapse at night. I would like to have a little more control over the shutter speed in time lapse mode, and iso setting, etc, but overall it is very good! If you but a waterproof case from here it can also be used with GoPro accessories, and the 1/4-20 threads are really convenient for mounting on a tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.description:
Style:Camera Only| Color:White PearlMaximum Fidelity and Cutting-edge Tech
Customized with the newest Ambarella A9SE75 Chip and Sony IMX377 Image Sensor to support first-class image capture/encoding. Built-in Electronic Image Stabilization (EIS) with 3-axis gyroscope and 3-axis accelerometer provides stable video even when the camera shakes, moves, or experiences impact. The camera with state-of-the-art low power 28nm A9SE chip that enables stable and long lasting video recording due to its high performing cooling system.

Ease of Use
The YI 4K Action Camera features an impact resistant Gorilla Glass 2.2" LCD touchscreen so you can shoot and preview with the touch of a finger. Connect to the YI Action App using built-in high-speed 5GHz Wi-Fi to edit, apply filters, add music, and share on social media instantly. 

Versatile Fashion Item
Shoot high resolution videos at 4k 30fps / 1080p 120fps / 720p 240fps and capture 12M photos using our selection of photo and video modes including Timelapse, Slow Motion, Timer, and Burst.
With new colors and a high quality finish, YI 4K Action Camera is not just for shooting amazing photos and videos, but also the fashion accessory you've been waiting for.

The Package Contains:
1x YI 4K Action Camera
1x rechargeable battery
1x USB cable
1x Manual

About YI
YI believes that premium imaging technology should be accessible to all. With our passion and hard work, everyone can take charge, inspire others, and change lives. We are YI, the Young Innovator.

Note

Long Battery Life – High capacity rechargeable lithium-ion battery records up to 120mins of 4K/30fps video with a single charge. High performing cooling system prevents YI 4K Action Camera of overheating and enables stable video recording.

Intuitive Touchscreen UI - Built-in 2.2” high responsive LCD touchscreen with 640 X 360 high resolution for easy setting, previewing and shooting. Newly released voice command makes shooting even easier than before. Touchscreen is made with Gorilla Glass Retina to resist scratches and daily impact.

Instant Sharing -- Built-in Bluetooth and high speed 5GHz/2.4GHz Wi-Fi support for wireless remote control and the YI Action App for instant photo and video editing, sharing and live streaming to social media.

Advanced Features – Always update to the latest firmware (1.8.25) to enjoy the extra features. Flexible settings of ISO/WB/SHUTTER/EV/METER for 12MP raw file help you produce high quality images even in low-light condition; Multi record/capture modes, including burst, slow-motion, timelapse, etc, get more creative and fun. Voice control is available with the latest firmware.
